pullRequest.title: ISPN-11378 Split StateRequestCommand into individual commands
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://issues.redhat.com/browse/ISPN-11378
@danberindei This should be the last of the command refactorings 😄

nodes.bodyText:
origin is always rpcManager.getAddress().
It is not necessary to set it in the constructor neither sending it through the wire.
what about using IntSetsExternalization.writeTo() and IntSetsExternalization.readFrom()?

[opinion]
I'm not sure about this anymore :) we are allocating +4 bytes per instance just to avoid implementing byte getCommandId()

can be removed and use StateTransferCancelCommand
I'm aware boolean isReturnValueExpected() is different but both commands are sent async (any response is discarded) and both commands return null.
why TopologyAffectedCommand? you can use CacheRpcCommand
